entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Winchester

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
